Battle Moves/Traits
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Battle Moves/Traits
  • Battle Moves June 5 - 05:33 pm

  • ATK. December 6 - 07:19 pm

  • DEF. December 6 - 06:16 pm

  • SUP. December 6 - 06:36 pm

  • RES. December 6 - 06:44 pm

***Under Construction***

Battle Moves are those found on the "Breeder" menu, while the other categories are Traits for individual monsters that you can purchase using Anima.

Note that most of the Battle Moves lists are incomplete, due not some of them not having yet been unlocked in battle. The various Traits pages are also incomplete, as some Traits have upgrades that only appear once you purchase the first Trait, and others are available only to certain species (either main or sub types), so feel free to contribute what's missing.
